title: Louis Theroux - Complete Documentaries (BBC)
description:
TV : Documentary : TV quality : English


This torrent is the complete collection of Louis Theroux's BBC documentaries as of December 2008.

Files are mixed quality .avi categorized by series and episode.

Louis' current contract with the BBC has another three films left to be made as part of series 3. These films are obviously not in this archive as they have not been aired yet, but they will be included and the torrent reseeded when I have them.

I have found it very hard to find all of these films and thanks must be given to the original uploaders.

As far as I am aware this is the only complete archive of his films available on the internet.

Please seed this torrent to at least 100% after you have downloaded, it is a big archive and if people do not seed it will die very quickly.

Great thanks to Louis and the BBC for this fantastic series.

Enjoy, and please seed;
